ALCDISP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCDISP &DISP=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'DISP' KEYWORD
.*
.*       DISP='(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)'    ANY VALID DISPOSITION
.*       DISP=NAME                    NAME  DC  CL20'SHR'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         GBLA  &SPF1,&SPF2
         GBLC  &SPF3
         LCLA  &X,&LL,&D
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
         AIF   ('&SPF2' NE '0').GBSET
&SPF2    SETA  &SYSNDX
.GBSET   ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(1,1) NE '''').ZZZ
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DISP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSTATS        KEY FOR DSN STATUS
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  2
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&DISP'(2,1) NE '(').AAA
&D       SETA  &D+1
&LL      SETA  &D
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ',').BBB
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ')').BBB
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').BBB
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .AAA
.BBB     ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'NEW').CCC
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'MOD').DDD
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'SHR').EEE
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'OLD').FFF
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID DISPOSITION FIELD'
         MEXIT
.CCC     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DISP=(NEW,
         AGO   .GGG
.DDD     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     DISP=(MOD,
         AGO   .GGG
.EEE     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     DISP=(SHR,
         AGO   .GGG
.FFF     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     DISP=(OLD,
.GGG     ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
&D       SETA  &D+&LL
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ')').DONE
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').DONE
&D       SETA  &D+1
&LL      SETA  &D
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALNDISP        KEY FOR DSN NORMAL DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
.HHH     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ',').III
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ')').III
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').III
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .HHH
.III     ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'CATLG').JJJ
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'UNCATLG').KKK
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'DELETE').LLL
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'KEEP').MMM
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID DISPOSITION FIELD'
.JJJ     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     CATLG,
         AGO   .NNN
.KKK     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     UNCATLG,
         AGO   .NNN
.LLL     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DELETE,
         AGO   .NNN
.MMM     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     KEEP,
.NNN     ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
&D       SETA  &D+&LL
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ')').DONE
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').DONE
&D       SETA  &D+1
&LL      SETA  &D
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALCDISP        KEY FOR DSN CONDITIONAL DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
.OOO     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ',').PPP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ ')').PPP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').PPP
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .OOO
.PPP     ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'CATLG').QQQ
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'UNCATLG').RRR
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'DELETE').SSS
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'KEEP').TTT
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID DISPOSITION FIELD'
.QQQ     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     CATLG,
         AGO   .YYY
.RRR     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     UNCATLG,
         AGO   .YYY
.SSS     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DELETE,
         AGO   .YYY
.TTT     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     KEEP,
.YYY     ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AGO   .DONE
.ZZZ     ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DISP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSTATS        KEY FOR DSN STATUS
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   &DISP,C' '         ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  BLANK
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'  COMMA
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'  PAREN
         TRT   &DISP,SPFTRT       FIND END
         BNZ   MAAA&X             FOUND IT
&LA      SETC  'L''&DISP'
         LA    R1,&DISP+&LA       SET TO END OF FIELD
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,&DISP
         CLI   0(R3),C'('         IN PARENS ?
         BNE   MBBB&X             NO - OK
         LA    R3,1(R3)           YES - SKIP PAREN
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF DATA
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'NEW'
         BE    MCCC&X             DISP=NEW
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'MOD'
         BE    MDDD&X             DISP=MOD
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'SHR'
         BE    MEEE&X             DISP=SHR
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'OLD'
         BE    MFFF&X             DISP=OLD
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DISP=(NEW,
         B     MGGG&X
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     DISP=(MOD,
         B     MGGG&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     DISP=(SHR,
         B     MGGG&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     DISP=(OLD,
MGGG&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP DISP FIELD
         LA    R1,&DISP+&LA       SET TO END OF FIELD
         CR    R3,R1              END OF FIELD ?
         BNL   MZZZ&X             YES - DONE
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALNDISP        KEY FOR DSN NORMAL DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
MHHH&X   EQU   *
         TRT   0(8,R3),SPFTRT     FIND END OF NEXT PARM
         BNZ   MIII&X             FOUND IT
&LA      SETC  'L''&DISP'
         LA    R1,&DISP+&LA       SET TO END OF FIELD
MIII&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF DATA
         BM    MZZZ&X             NO DATA - DONE
         CLC   0(5,R3),=C'CATLG'
         BE    MJJJ&X             CATALOG
         CLC   0(7,R3),=C'UNCATLG'
         BE    MKKK&X             UNCATLG
         CLC   0(6,R3),=C'DELETE'
         BE    MLLL&X             DELETE
         CLC   0(4,R3),=C'KEEP'
         BE    MMMM&X             KEEP
         B     MZZZ&X             DONE
MJJJ&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     CATLG,
         B     MNNN&X
MKKK&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     UNCATLG,
         B     MNNN&X
MLLL&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DELETE,
         B     MNNN&X
MMMM&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     KEEP,
MNNN&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP DISP FIELD
         LA    R1,&DISP+&LA       SET TO END OF FIELD
         CR    R3,R1              END OF FIELD ?
         BNL   MZZZ&X             YES - DONE
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALCDISP        KEY FOR DSN CONDITIONAL DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         B     MHHH&X
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.DONE    ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL

.*

ALCDSN.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCDSN  &DSN=
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DSNAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALDSNAM        KEY FOR DSNAME
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'44'    MOVE 44 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&DSN'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         AIF   ('&DSN'(1,1) EQ '(').BBB
         CLI   &DSN,C' '          ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(43),S99TUPAR
&LA      SETC  'L''&DSN'
         MVC   S99TUPAR(&LA),&DSN  DSNAME
         AGO   .CCC
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&DSN'(2,K'&DSN-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(44),=CL44'&LIT'
         AGO   .CCC
.BBB     ANOP
         L     R1,SPFREGS+16       PICK UP ADDR OF DSN FIELD
         MVC   S99TUPAR(44),0(R1)
.CCC     ANOP
         LA    R14,50(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)

ALCDUMMY.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCDUMMY &DUMMY=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'DUMMY' KEYWORD
.*
.*       DUMMY='YES'            YES = DD DUMMY
.*       DUMMY=NAME             NAME  DC  CL3'YES' IGNORED IF NOT 'YES'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DD DUMMY
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&DUMMY'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLC   &DUMMY,=C'YES'     DUMMY=YES ?
         BNE   MAAA&X             NO - OK
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DUMMY'(2,3) NE 'YES').CCC
.BBB     ANOP
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALDUMMY        KEY FOR DUMMY
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MAAA&X   EQU   *
.CCC     ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)

ALCERR.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCERR &FUNC,&DD=,&DSN=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       RESULTS OF SVC 99 AND FILL IN THE SMSG AND LMSG FIELDS.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         GBLA  &SPF2
         GBLC  &SPF3
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LITDD,&LITDSN,&LA,&LB                       @MK
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         AIF   ('&SPF2' NE '0').GBSET
&SPF2    SETA  &SYSNDX
.GBSET   ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DYNAMIC ALLOCATION ERROR MESSAGES
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVC   LMSG,BLANKS
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS
.*
         AIF   (T'&DD EQ 'O' AND T'&DSN EQ 'O').GGG
&LA      SETC  '5'
         MVI   LMSG,C'&FUNC'
         AIF   (T'&DD EQ 'O').DDD
         MVC   LMSG+2(3),=C'DD='
         AIF   ('&DD'(1,1) NE '(').AAA
         MVC   LMSG+&LA.(8),0&DD
         AGO   .CCC
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DD'(1,1) NE '''').BBB
&LITDD   SETC  '&DD'(2,K'&DD-2)
         MVC   LMSG+&LA.(8),=CL8'&LITDD'
         AGO   .CCC
.BBB     ANOP
         MVC   LMSG+&LA.(8),&DD
.CCC     ANOP
&LA      SETC  '18'
.DDD     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&DSN EQ 'O').GGG
         MVC   LMSG+14(4),=C'DSN='
         AIF   ('&DSN'(1,1) NE '(').EEE
         MVC   LMSG+&LA.(44),0&DSN
         AGO   .GGG
.EEE     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DSN'(1,1) NE '''').FFF
&LITDSN  SETC  '&DSN'(2,K'&DSN-2)
         MVC    LMSG+&LA.(44),=CL44'&LITDSN'
         AGO   .GGG
.FFF     ANOP
&LB      SETC  'L''&DSN'
         MVC   LMSG+&LA.(&LB),&DSN
.GGG     ANOP
         BAL   R14,SPF2&SPF2
         AIF   ('&SPF3' EQ 'X').DONE
&SPF3    SETC  'X'
         B     M999&X
SPF2&SPF2 DS  0H
         LTR   R15,R15            ALLOCATION SUCCESSFUL ?
         BZ    MZZZ&X             YES - OK
         CVD   R15,SPFDBWRD
         UNPK  SPFDYN15,SPFDBWRD+6(2)
         OI    SPFDYN15+3,X'F0'
*
         UNPK  SPFDBWRD(5),S99ERROR(3) 1 MORE THAN FIELD SIZE
         TR    SPFDBWRD(4),TR&X-240 TRANSLATE
         MVC   SPFDYNER,SPFDBWRD   MOVE TO ERROR SLOT
*
         UNPK  SPFDBWRD(5),S99INFO(3)
         TR    SPFDBWRD(4),TR&X-240 TRANSLATE
         MVC   SPFDYNIN,SPFDBWRD
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0210'    DATA SET IN USE ?
         BNE   MBBB&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(15),=C'DATA SET IN USE'
         B     MZZZ&X
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'031C'    INVALID MEMBER NAME ?
         BNE   MCCC&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(19),=C'INVALID MEMBER NAME'
         B     MZZZ&X
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0320'    INVALID DSNAME ?
         BNE   MDDD&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(21),=C'INVALID DATA SET NAME'
         B     MZZZ&X
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0330'    MBR SPECIFIED, DSN NOT A PDS
         BNE   MEEE&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(17),=C'THIS IS NOT A PDS'
         B     MZZZ&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0440'    DATA SET NOT FOUND
         BNE   MFFF&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(18),=C'DATA SET NOT FOUND'
         B     MZZZ&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'1708'    DATA SET NOT CATALOGED
         BNE   MGGG&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(22),=C'DATA SET NOT CATALOGED'
         B     MZZZ&X
MGGG&X   EQU   *
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0410'    DDNAME UNAVAILABLE
         BNE   MHHH&X             NO
         MVC   SMSG(18),=C'DDNAME UNAVAILABLE'
         B     MZZZ&X
MHHH&X   EQU   *
MYYY&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SMSG(16),=C'ALLOCATION ERROR'
         MVC   SMSG+17(4),SPFDYNER
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
         BR    R14
TR&X     DC    C'0123456789ABCDEF'
ERR1&SPF2 DS    0H
         LA    R15,32
         MVC   SPFDYN15,=C'0032'
         MVC   SPFDYNER,=C'9999'
         MVC   SPFDYNIN,=C'9999'
         BR    R14
M999&X   DS    0H
.DONE    ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY

.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE
.*    INTEGRATED INTO ANY PROGRAM FOR SUCH USE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

ALCFCB.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCFCB &FCB=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'FCB' KEYWORD
.*
.*       FCB='6'                1 - 4 BYTE FCB NAME
.*       FCB=NAME               NAME  DC  CL3'608'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        FCB IMAGE NAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALFCBIM        KEY FOR FCB
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'4'     MOVE 4 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&FCB'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &FCB,C' '          ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(3),S99TUPAR
         MVC   S99TUPAR(L'&FCB),&FCB
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&FCB'(2,K'&FCB-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(4),=CL4'&LIT'  FCB IMAGE
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,10(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*

ALCFREE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCFREE &FREE=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

.*       'FREE' KEYWORD

.*       FREE=NAME              NAME  DC  CL5'CLOSE'

         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX

.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&FREE'(2,5) NE 'CLOSE').CCC
.BBB     ANOP

         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD

         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT

.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

.*       'LRECL' KEYWORD
.*
.*       LRECL='NNNNN'          NUMERIC VALUE - MAX 32767
.*       LRECL=NAME             NAME  DC  H'NNNNN'  HALFWORD
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        LRECL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALLRECL        KEY FOR LRECL
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'2'     MOVE 2 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&LRECL'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLC   &LRECL,=H'0'       ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVC   S99TUPAR(2),&LRECL LRECL
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&LRECL'(2,K'&LRECL-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(2),=AL2(&LIT)   LRECL
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,8(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*

.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:

ALCMBR.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCMBR &MBR=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'MBR' KEYWORD
.*
.*       MBR='PGMA'             MEMBER NAME - 1 - 8 BYTES
.*       MBR=NAME               NAME  DC  CL4'PGMA'  1 - 8 BYTES
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        MEMBER NAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALMEMBR        KEY FOR MEMBER NAME
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'8'     MOVE 8 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&MBR'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &MBR,C' '          ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(7),S99TUPAR
&LA      SETC  'L''&MBR'
         MVC   S99TUPAR(&LA),&MBR   MEMBER NAME
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&MBR'(2,K'&MBR-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(8),=CL8'&LIT' MEMBER NAME
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,14(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*

ALCMODEL.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCMODEL &MODEL=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'MODEL' KEYWORD (DCB=A.DATA.SET.NAME)
.*
.*       MODEL='DATA.SET.NAME'  DATA SET NAME, 1 - 44 CHARACTERS
.*       MODEL=NAME             NAME  DC  CL24'DATA.SET.NAME'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        MODEL    -     DCB=DATA.SET.NAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALDCBDS        KEY FOR DCB DATA SET
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'44'    MOVE 44 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&MODEL'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &MODEL,C' '        ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(43),S99TUPAR
         MVC   S99TUPAR(L'&MODEL),&MODEL
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&MODEL'(2,K'&MODEL-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(44),=CL44'&LIT'  DCB=DATA.SET.NAME
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,50(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TEXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*

.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*

ALCOUTPT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCOUTPT &OUTPUT=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'OUTPUT' KEYWORD
.*
.*       OUTPUT='DOCPRT'        OUTPUT STATEMENT NAME
.*       OUTPUT=NAME            NAME  DC  CL8'DOCPRT'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT,&LL
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        OUTPUT NAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         MVC   S99TUKEY(2),=X'8002' KEY FOR OUTPUT
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'26'    SET DEFAULT TO 26
         AIF   ('&OUTPUT'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &OUTPUT,C' '       ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(25),S99TUPAR
&LL      SETC  'L''&OUTPUT'
         MVC   S99TUPAR(&LL),&OUTPUT NAME
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&OUTPUT'(2,K'&OUTPUT-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(26),=CL26'&LIT'
.BBB     ANOP
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   S99TUPAR(26),SPFTRT   FIND END
         BNZ   MAAA&X             FOUND THE END
         LA    R1,26              SET TO 26, ALL BYTES USED
         B     MBBB&X
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R2,S99TUPAR        START
         SR    R1,R2              LENGTH OF DATA
         STCM  R1,3,S99TULNG      SET THE LENGTH CODE
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,6(R1,R14)      BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*

.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

ALCRECFM.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCRECFM &RECFM=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'RECFM' KEYWORD
.*
.*       RECFM='FBA'            1 - 3 BYTES
.*       RECFM=NAME             NAME  DC  CL3'VBS'  1 - 3 BYTES
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         GBLA  &SPF1,&SPF2
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(1,1) EQ '''').LITERAL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RECORD FORMAT
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         CLI   &RECFM,C' '        ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALRECFM        KEY FOR RECFM
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   &RECFM,C'F'        FIXED ?
         BE    MAAA&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM,C'V'        VARIABLE ?
         BE    MBBB&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM,C'U'        UNDEFINED ?
         BE    MCCC&X             YES
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'80'     FIXED
         B     MDDD&X
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'40'     VARIABLE
         B     MDDD&X
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'C0'     UNDEFINED
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         AIF   (L'&RECFM LT 2).NOMORE
         CLI   &RECFM+1,C'B'      BLOCKED ?
         BE    MEEE&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM+1,C'A'      ANS ?
         BE    MFFF&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM+1,C'M'      MACHINE ?
         BE    MGGG&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM+1,C' '      END OF DATA ?
         BE    MKKK&X             YES
         B     ERR1&SPF2
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'10'     BLOCKED
         B     MHHH&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'04'     ANS
         B     MHHH&X
MGGG&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'02'     MACHINE
MHHH&X   EQU   *
         AIF   (L'&RECFM LT 3).NOMORE
         CLI   &RECFM+2,C'A'      ANS ?
         BE    MIII&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM+2,C'M'      MACHINE ?
         BE    MJJJ&X             YES
         CLI   &RECFM+2,C' '      END OF DATA ?
         BE    MKKK&X             YES
         B     ERR1&SPF2
MIII&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'04'     ANS
         B     MKKK&X
MJJJ&X   EQU   *
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'02'     MACHINE
.NOMORE  ANOP
MKKK&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
         AGO   .DONE
.LITERAL ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RECORD FORMAT
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALRECFM        KEY FOR RECFM
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(2,1) EQ 'F').AAA
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(2,1) EQ 'V').BBB
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(2,1) EQ 'U').CCC
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID RECFM'
         MEXIT
.AAA     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'80'     FIXED
         AGO   .DDD
.BBB     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'40'     VARIABLE
         AGO   .DDD
.CCC     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'C0'     UNDEFINED
.DDD     ANOP
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(3,1) EQ '''').KKK
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(3,1) EQ 'B').EEE
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(3,1) EQ 'A').FFF
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(3,1) EQ 'M').GGG
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID RECFM'
         MEXIT
.EEE     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'10'     BLOCKED
         AGO   .HHH
.FFF     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'04'     ASA CONTROL CHARACTER
         AGO   .KKK
.GGG     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'02'     MACHINE CHARACTER
         AGO   .KKK
.HHH     ANOP
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(4,1) EQ '''').KKK
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(4,1) EQ 'A').III
         AIF   ('&RECFM'(4,1) EQ 'M').JJJ
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID RECFM'
         MEXIT
.III     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'04'     ASA CONTROL CHARACTER
         AGO   .KKK
.JJJ     ANOP
         OI    S99TUPAR,X'02'     MACHINE CHARACTER
.KKK     ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.DONE    ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY

.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE

.*

ALCRLSE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCRLSE &RLSE=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'RLSE' KEYWORD
.*
.*       RLSE='YES'             IGNORED IF ANY OTHER VALUE
.*       RLSE=NAME              NAME  DC  CL3'YES'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RELEASE UNUSED SPACE
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&RLSE'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLC   &RLSE,=C'YES'      RLSE=YES ?
         BNE   MAAA&X             NO - OK
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&RLSE'(2,3) NE 'YES').CCC
.BBB     ANOP
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALRLSE         KEY FOR RLSE OPTION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TEXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MAAA&X   EQU   *
.CCC     ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)

.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*

.*

.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

         MEND

ALCSPACE.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCSPACE &SPACE=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'SPACE' KEYWORD
.*
.*       SPACE='(6160,(100,10),RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND)'
.*       SPACE=NAME             NAME  DC  CL20'(TRK,1)'
.*              ANY VALID SPACE PARAMETERS
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         GBLA  &SPF1,&SPF2
         LCLA  &X,&LL,&D
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(1,1) NE '''').FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SPACE='(6160,(10,10,10),RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND)'
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
&D       SETA  3
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(3,3) EQ 'CYL').TAAA
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(3,3) EQ 'TRK').TBBB
         AGO   .TCCC
.TAAA    ANOP
         LA    R1,DALCYL          KEY FOR CYLINDER ALLOCATION
         AGO   .TFFF
.TBBB    ANOP
         LA    R1,DALTRK          KEY FOR TRACK ALLOCATION
         AGO   .TFFF
.TCCC    ANOP
         LA    R1,DALBLKLN        KEY FOR BLOCK ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
.TDDD    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ',').TEEE
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .TDDD
.TEEE    ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SPACE'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(3),=AL3(&LIT)  MOVE BLOCK SIZE
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AGO   .TEND
.TFFF    ANOP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.TEND    ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        PRIMARY ALLOCATION
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALPRIME        KEY FOR PRIME ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+1
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) NE '(').PAAA
&D       SETA  &D+1
&LL      SETA  &D
.PAAA    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ',').PBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ')').PBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ '''').PBBB
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .PAAA
.PBBB    ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SPACE'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(3),=AL3(&LIT)  PRIMARY SIZE
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ ')').DEND
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL+1,1) EQ ',').SCCC             ¢
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SECONDARY ALLOCATION - LITERAL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSECND        KEY FOR SECONDARY ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+1
&LL      SETA  &D
.SAAA    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ',').SBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ')').SBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ '''').SBBB
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .SAAA
.SBBB    ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SPACE'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(3),=AL3(&LIT) SECONDARY SIZE
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ ')').DEND
         AGO   .SDDD         ¢
.SCCC    ANOP                ¢
&D       SETA   &D+1         ¢
.SDDD    ANOP                ¢
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DIRECTORY BLOCKS
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALDIR          KEY FOR DIRECTORY ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+1
&LL      SETA  &D
.DAAA    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ',').DBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ')').DBBB
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ '''').DBBB
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .DAAA
.DBBB    ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SPACE'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(3),=AL3(&LIT) DIRECTORY BLOCKS
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.DEND    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ ')').RAAA
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ '''').DONE
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SPACE VALUE'
         MEXIT
.RAAA    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL+1,1) EQ ')').DONE
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL+1,1) EQ '''').DONE
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL+1,1) EQ ',').RBBB
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SPACE VALUE'
         MEXIT
.RBBB    ANOP
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+2
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,1) EQ ',').REND
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,4) EQ 'RLSE').RCCC
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SPACE VALUE'
         MEXIT
.RCCC    ANOP
&LL      SETA  4
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RLSE PARAMETER - LITERAL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALRLSE         KEY FOR RLSE OPTION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.REND    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ ')').DONE
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ '''').DONE
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL+1,1) NE ',').FAAA
&D       SETA  &D+&LL
&LL      SETA  1
         AGO   .FEND
.FAAA    ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SPECIFIC FORM OF ALLOCATION - LITERAL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSPFRM        KEY FOR SPECIFIC FORM OF ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+1
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,3) EQ 'ALX').FDDD
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,4) EQ 'MXIG').FCCC
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,6) EQ 'CONTIG').FBBB
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SPACE VALUE'
         MEXIT
.FBBB    ANOP
&LL      SETA  6
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     CONTIG
         AGO   .FEEE
.FCCC    ANOP
&LL      SETA  4
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     MXIG
         AGO   .FEEE
.FDDD    ANOP
&LL      SETA  3
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     ALX
.FEEE    ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TEXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.FEND    ANOP
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ ')').DONE
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D+&LL,1) EQ '''').DONE
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        ROUND PARAMETER
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALROUND        KEY FOR ROUND ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
&D       SETA  &D+&LL+1
         AIF   ('&SPACE'(&D,5) EQ 'ROUND').NAAA
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SPACE PARAMETER FOR ROUND OPTION'
         MEXIT
.NAAA    ANOP
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AGO   .DONE
.FIELD   ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SPACE=(6160,(10,10,10),RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND) - FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         CLI   &SPACE,C' '        ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   SEND&X             NO - SKIP IT
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R3,&SPACE
         CLI   0(R3),C'('         MUST BE A PAREN
         BE    TAAA&X
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
TAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST PAREN
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'CYL'    CYLINDER ALLOCATION ?
         BE    TBBB&X             YES - OK
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'TRK'    TRACK ALLOCATION ?
         BE    TCCC&X             YES - OK
         B     TDDD&X             MUST BE BLOCK ALLOCATION
TBBB&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,DALCYL          KEY FOR CYLINDER ALLOCATION
         B     TFFF&X
TCCC&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,DALTRK          KEY FOR TRACK ALLOCATION
         B     TFFF&X
TDDD&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,DALBLKLN        KEY FOR BLOCK ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'  COMMA
&LA      SETC  'L''&SPACE-1'
         TRT   0(&LA,R3),SPFTRT
         BNZ   TEEE&X             FOUND IT
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
TEEE&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF BLKSIZE PARM
         BCTR  R1,R0              LENGTH-1
         EX    R1,PACK&X          PACK THE BLKSIZE
         CVB   R2,DBWD&X
         STCM  R2,7,S99TUPAR      MOVE BLKSIZE
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT PARM IN SPACE FIELD
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         B     TGGG&X
TFFF&X   EQU   *
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R3,3(R3) BUMP TO NEXT PARM IN SPACE FIELD @MK CHG FROM 4
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         B     TGGG&X
PACK&X   PACK  DBWD&X,0(0,R3)     PACK BLKSIZE
DBWD&X   DC    D'0'
TGGG&X   EQU   *
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        PRIMARY ALLOCATION - FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALPRIME        KEY FOR PRIME ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    PAAA&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
PAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST COMMAS
         CLI   0(R3),C'('         PAREN ?
         BNE   PBBB&X             NO - OK
         LA    R3,1(R3)           YES - BUMP PAST PAREN
PBBB&X   EQU   *
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'  COMMA
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'  PAREN
&LA      SETC  'L''&SPACE-4'
         TRT   0(&LA,R3),SPFTRT   FIND COMMA OR PAREN
         BNZ   PCCC&X             FOUND
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
PCCC&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF FIELD
         BCTR  R1,R0              LENGTH-1
         EX    R1,PACK&X          PACK THE PRIMARY
         CVB   R2,DBWD&X
         STCM  R2,7,S99TUPAR      MOVE PRIMARY
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT SPACE PARM
         CLC   0(2,R3),=C'))'     END OF SPACE PARMS ?
         BE    SEND&X
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF ALLOCATION PARMS ?
         BE    AEND&X             YES - CHECK FOR RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SECONDARY ALLOCATION - FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSECND        KEY FOR SECONDARY ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    SAAA&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
SAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST COMMA
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'  COMMA
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'  PAREN
&LA      SETC  'L''&SPACE-8'
         TRT   0(&LA,R3),SPFTRT   FIND COMMA OR PAREN
         BNZ   SBBB&X             FOUND
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
SBBB&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF FIELD
         BCTR  R1,R0              LENGTH-1
         EX    R1,PACK&X          PACK THE PRIMARY
         CVB   R2,DBWD&X
         STCM  R2,7,S99TUPAR      MOVE BLKSIZE
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT SPACE PARM
         CLC   0(2,R3),=C'))'     END OF SPACE PARMS ?
         BE    SEND&X
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF ALLOCATION PARMS ?
         BE    AEND&X             YES - CHECK FOR RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DIRECTORY BLOCKS
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALDIR          KEY FOR DIRECTORY ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'3'     MOVE 3 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    DAAA&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
DAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST COMMA
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'  PAREN
&LA      SETC  'L''&SPACE-10'
         TRT   0(&LA,R3),SPFTRT   FIND PAREN
         BNZ   DBBB&X             FOUND
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
DBBB&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF FIELD
         BCTR  R1,R0              LENGTH-1
         EX    R1,PACK&X          PACK THE DIRECTORY BLKS
         CVB   R2,DBWD&X
         STCM  R2,7,S99TUPAR      MOVE DIRECTORY BLOCKS
         LA    R14,9(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT SPACE PARM
         CLC   0(2,R3),=C'))'     END OF SPACE PARMS ?
         BE    SEND&X
AEND&X   EQU   *
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RLSE PARAMETER
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST PAREN
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    RAAA&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
RAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST COMMA
         LA    R1,0               SET DEFAULT LENGTH
         CLI   0(R3),C','         OMITTED ?
         BE    RCCC&X             YES - OK
         CLC   0(4,R3),=C'RLSE'   RELEASE ?
         BE    RBBB&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
RBBB&X   EQU   *
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALRLSE         KEY FOR RLSE OPTION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         LA    R1,4               SET DEFAULT LENGTH
RCCC&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,0(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT PARM
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SPECIFIC FORM OF ALLOCATION - FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF PARMS ?
         BE    SEND&X
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    FAAA&X             OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
FAAA&X   EQU   *
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSPFRM        KEY FOR SPECIFIC FORM OF ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         LA    R3,1(R3)
         LA    R1,0               SET DEFAULT LENGTH
         CLI   0(R3),C','         OMITTED ?
         BE    FFFF&X             YES - OK
         CLC   0(3,R3),=C'ALX'    ALX ?
         BE    FDDD&X             YES - OK
         CLC   0(4,R3),=C'MXIG'   MXIG ?
         BE    FCCC&X             YES - OK
         CLC   0(6,R3),=C'CONTIG' CONTIG ?
         BE    FBBB&X             YES - OK
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
FBBB&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,6               LENGTH
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     CONTIG
         B     FEEE&X
FCCC&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,4
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     MXIG
         B     FEEE&X
FDDD&X   EQU   *
         LA    R1,3
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     ALX
FEEE&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TEXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
FFFF&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,0(R1,R3)
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        ROUND PARAMETER - FIELD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF PARMS ?
         BE    SEND&X
         CLI   0(R3),C','         MUST BE A COMMA
         BE    OAAA&X
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
OAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP
         CLC   0(5,R3),=C'ROUND'
         BE    OBBB&X
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
OBBB&X   EQU   *
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALROUND        KEY FOR ROUND ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
SEND&X   EQU   *
.DONE    ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)

.*

ALCSSOUT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCSSOUT &SYSOUT=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'SYSOUT' KEYWORD
.*
.*       SYSOUT='(F,,973)'      ANY VALID SYSOUT PARAMETERS
.*       SYSOUT=NAME            NAME  DC  CL8'(A,INTRDR)'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X,&LL,&D
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SYSOUT CLASS
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSYSOU        KEY FOR SYSOUT CLASS
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA010
         CLI   &SYSOUT,C' '       ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   Z030&X             NO - SKIP IT
         LA    R3,&SYSOUT         START OF FIELD
         CLI   0(R3),C'('         IN PARENS ?
         BNE   A010&X             NO - OK
         LA    R3,1(R3)           YES - SKIP PAREN
A010&X   EQU   *
         CLI   0(R3),C'*'         SYSOUT=* ?
         BNE   B010&X             NO - OK
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         B     C010&X
B010&X   EQU   *
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         MVC   S99TUPAR(1),0(R3)  SYSOUT CLASS
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
C010&X   EQU   *
         AGO   .ZZZ010
.AAA010  ANOP
&D       SETA  2
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) NE '(').BBB010
&D       SETA  &D+1
.BBB010  ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&SYSOUT'(&D,1)
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AIF   ('&LIT' NE '*').CCC010
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AGO   .ZZZ010
.CCC010  ANOP
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C'&LIT'
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.ZZZ010  ANOP
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA020
         AGO   .BBB020
.AAA020  ANOP
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ '''').ZZZ030
         AIF   (K'&SYSOUT LE &D).ZZZ030
.BBB020  ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SYSOUT PROGRAM NAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSPGNM        KEY FOR SYSOUT PROGRAM NAME
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'8'     MOVE 8 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(1,1) EQ '''').CCC020
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST CLASS
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF DATA ?
         BE    Z030&X
         CLI   0(R3),C' '         END OF DATA ?
         BE    Z030&X
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST COMMA
         CLI   0(R3),C','         DOUBLE COMMA ?
         BE    Z020&X
&LA      SETC  'L''&SYSOUT'
         C     R3,=A(&SYSOUT+&LA)  END OF FIELD ?
         BNL   Z030&X
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'
         TRT   0(8,R3),SPFTRT
         BNZ   A020&X
         LA    R1,8(R3)           MAX NAME LENGTH
A020&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3
         MVC   S99TUPAR(8),=8C' '
         EX    R1,MVC1&X
         B     B020&X
MVC1&X   MVC   S99TUPAR(0),&SYSOUT+2
         AGO   .YYY020
.CCC020  ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ ',').XXX020
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID SYSOUT LITERAL'
         MEXIT
.XXX020  ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D+1
.DDD020  ANOP
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ ',').ZZZ020
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ '''').EEE020
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ ')').EEE020
         AGO   .DDD020
.EEE020  ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SYSOUT'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(8),=CL8'&LIT'
&D       SETA  &D+&LL
&LL      SETA  &D
.YYY020  ANOP
B020&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,14(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
.ZZZ020  ANOP
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA030
         LA    R3,1(R1,R3)        BUMP TO NEXT SYSOUT PARM
Z020&X   EQU   *
         AGO   .BBB030
.AAA030  ANOP
         AIF   (K'&SYSOUT LE &LL).ZZZ030
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ ')').ZZZ030
.BBB030  ANOP
&D       SETA  &D+1
&LL      SETA  &D
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SYSOUT FORM NUMBER
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALSFMNO        KEY FOR FORM
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'4'     MOVE 4 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(1,1) EQ '''').CCC030
         LA    R3,1(R3)           BUMP PAST CLASS
         CLI   0(R3),C')'         END OF DATA ?
         BE    Z030&X
&LA      SETC  'L''&SYSOUT'
         C     R3,=A(&SYSOUT+&LA)  END OF FIELD ?
         BNL   Z030&X
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'
         MVI   SPFTRT+C',',X'FF'
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'
         TRT   0(4,R3),SPFTRT
         BNZ   A030&X
         LA    R1,4(R3)
A030&X   EQU   *
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF PARM
         BCTR  R1,R0              DECR FOR EXECUTE
         MVC   S99TUPAR(4),=4C' '
         EX    R1,MVC2&X
         B     B030&X
MVC2&X   MVC   S99TUPAR(0),0(R3)
         AGO   .YYY030
.CCC030  ANOP
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ '''').DDD030
         AIF   ('&SYSOUT'(&D,1) EQ ')').DDD030
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .CCC030
.DDD030  ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
&LIT     SETC  '&SYSOUT'(&D,&LL)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(4),=CL4'&LIT'
.YYY030  ANOP
B030&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,10(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
Z030&X   EQU   *
.ZZZ030  ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY

.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE
.*    INTEGRATED INTO ANY PROGRAM FOR SUCH USE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MEND

ALCTERM.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCTERM &TERM=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'TERM' KEYWORD
.*
.*       TERM='TS'              IGNORED IF ANY OTHER VALUE
.*       TERM=NAME              NAME  DC  CL2'TS'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        TERMINAL
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&TERM'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLC   &TERM,=C'TS'       TERM=TS ?
         BNE   MAAA&X             NO - OK
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&TERM'(2,2) NE 'TS').CCC
.BBB     ANOP
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALTERM         KEY FOR TERMINAL
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'0'     MOVE 0 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         LA    R14,4(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MAAA&X   EQU   *
.CCC     ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.

ALCUDISP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCUDISP &DISP=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'DISP' KEYWORD FOR UNALLOCATION REQUESTS. IT WILL OVERRIDE THE
.*       DISPOSITION ASSIGNED TO A DATA SET WHEN IT WAS ALLOCATED.
.*       @MK           @MK              @MK        @MK
.*       DISP=CATLG   ANY VALID DISPOSITION (UNCATLG,CATLG,KEEP,DELETE)
.*       DISP=NAME    NAME  DC  CL20'KEEP'  DO NOT CODE VALUE IN PARENS
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         GBLA  &SPF1,&SPF2
         GBLC  &SPF3
         LCLA  &X,&LL,&D
         LCLC  &LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
         AIF   ('&SPF2' NE '0').GBSET
&SPF2    SETA  &SYSNDX
.GBSET   ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(1,1) NE '''').ZZZ
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        DISP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DUNOVDSP        KEY FOR OVERRIDING DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
&D       SETA  2
&LL      SETA  &D
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,1) EQ '''').BBB
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AGO   .AAA
.BBB     ANOP
&LL      SETA  &D-&LL
&D       SETA  &D-&LL
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'DELETE').CCC
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'CATLG').DDD
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'KEEP').EEE
         AIF   ('&DISP'(&D,&LL) EQ 'UNCATLG').FFF
         MNOTE 8,'INVALID DISPOSITION FIELD'
         MEXIT
.CCC     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DISP=DELETE
         AGO   .GGG
.DDD     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     DISP=CATLG
         AGO   .GGG
.EEE     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     DISP=KEEP
         AGO   .GGG
.FFF     ANOP
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     DISP=UNCATLG
.GGG     ANOP
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
         AGO   .DONE
.ZZZ     ANOP
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DUNOVDSP        KEY FOR OVERRIDING DISP
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         CLI   &DISP,C' '         ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         LA    R3,&DISP
         CLC   0(6,R3),=C'DELETE'
         BE    MCCC&X             DISP=DELETE
         CLC   0(5,R3),=C'CATLG'
         BE    MDDD&X             DISP=CATLG
         CLC   0(4,R3),=C'KEEP'
         BE    MEEE&X             DISP=KEEP
         CLC   0(7,R3),=C'UNCATLG'
         BE    MFFF&X             DISP=UNCATLG
         BAL   R14,ERR1&SPF2
         B     MZZZ&SPF1
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'04'     DISP=DELETE
         B     MGGG&X
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'02'     DISP=CATLG
         B     MGGG&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'08'     DISP=KEEP
         B     MGGG&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         MVI   S99TUPAR,X'01'     DISP=UNCATLG
MGGG&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,7(R14)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.DONE    ANOP
         MEND

ALCUNAL.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCUNAL
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO FOR ALL

ALCUNIT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCUNIT &UNIT=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'UNIT' KEYWORD
.*
.*       UNIT='SYSDA'           ANY VALID UNIT NAME, 1 - 8 BYTES
.*       UNIT=NAME              NAME  DC  CL4'3350'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT,&LL
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        UNIT
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT POINTER
         LA    R1,DALUNIT         KEY FOR UNIT ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'8'     MOVE 8 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&UNIT'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &UNIT,C' '         ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(7),S99TUPAR
&LL      SETC  'L''&UNIT'
         MVC   S99TUPAR(&LL),&UNIT UNIT NAME
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&UNIT'(2,K'&UNIT-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(8),=CL8'&LIT'  UNITNAME
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,14(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*

ALCVOL.text:
MACRO
&NAME    ALCVOL &VOL=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO IS CALLED BY THE 'SPFALLOC' MACRO TO PROCESS THE
.*       'VOL' KEYWORD
.*
.*       VOL='MVSRES'           VOLUME SERIAL NUMBER, 1 - 6 BYTES
.*       VOL=NAME               NAME  DC  CL6'NEWRES'
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        VOLSER
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         STCM  R14,15,S99TUPTR    TEXT UNIT PARAMETER
         LA    R1,DALVLSER        KEY FOR VOL SER ALLOCATION
         STCM  R1,3,S99TUKEY      PUT IN TEXT UNIT KEY FIELD
         MVC   S99TUNUM,=H'1'     MOVE 1 TO TXT UNIT NUMBR FLD
         MVC   S99TULNG,=H'6'     MOVE 6 TO TXT UNIT LNGTH FLD
         AIF   ('&VOL'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         CLI   &VOL,C' '          ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X             NO - SKIP IT
         MVI   S99TUPAR,C' '
         MVC   S99TUPAR+1(5),S99TUPAR
         MVC   S99TUPAR(6),&VOL VOLSER
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&VOL'(2,K'&VOL-2)
         MVC   S99TUPAR(6),=CL6'&LIT'  VOLSER
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,12(R14)        BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT
         LA    R15,4(R15)         BUMP TO NEXT TXT UNIT PTR
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MEND
