SPFDS1.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFDS1 &ODS,&TDSN,&TMBR
&NAME    DS    0H
         GBLA  &Y
         LCLC  &REGO,&REGD,&REGM,&LA
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       OTHER DATA SET NAME FIELD
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         XR    R0,R0                   CLEAR
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT           CLEAR TRANSLATE TABLE
         MVI   FLD&Y,X'04'             INDICATE OTHER DSN USED
&REGD    SETC  'R15'
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').AAA
         LA    &REGD,&TDSN             ADDRESS OF TARGET FIELD
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&REGD    SETC  '&TDSN'(2,K'&TDSN-2)
.BBB     ANOP
         AIF   ('&ODS'(1,1) EQ '(').CCC
         LA    R14,&ODS                ADDRESS OF OTHER DATA SET
         AGO   .DDD
.CCC     ANOP
&REGO    SETC  '&ODS'(2,K'&ODS-2)
         LR    R14,&REGO               COPY ADDR
.DDD     ANOP
         CLI   0(R14),C'¬'             IGNORE OTHER DSN ?
         BE    MDDD&X                  YES - SKIP IT
         CLI   0(R14),C' '             IGNORE OTHER DSN ?
         BNH   MDDD&X                  NO - SKIP IT
         CLI   0(R14),X'7D'            NAME IN QUOTES ?
         BNE   MAAA&X                  NO - ADD PREFIX
         LA    R14,1(R14)              SKIP QUOTE
         B     MBBB&X
MAAA&X   DS    0H
         MVC   0(L'ZPREFIX,&REGD),ZPREFIX MOVE USER PREFIX
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'       SET TRT KEY
         MVI   SPFTRT,X'FF'            SET TRT KEY
         TRT   0(L'ZPREFIX,&REGD),SPFTRT END OF PREFIX
         MVI   0(R1),C'.'              ADD DOT
         LR    R0,&REGD                SAVE &REGD
         LA    &REGD,1(R1)             BUMP TARGET
MBBB&X   DS    0H
         MVI   SPFTRT+C'(',X'FF'      SET TRT KEY
         MVI   SPFTRT+X'7D',X'FF'     SET TRT KEY
         AIF   ('&ODS'(1,1) EQ '(').EEE
&LA      SETC  'L''&ODS'
         TRT   0(&LA,R14),SPFTRT      FIND MEMBER/END OF DSN
         AGO   .FFF
.EEE     ANOP
         TRT   0(56,R14),SPFTRT       FIND MEMBER/END OF DSN
.FFF     ANOP
         SR    R1,R14                 LENGTH OF DSN
         BCTR  R1,R0                  DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCD&X              MOVE DSN TO TARGET FIELD
         LTR   R0,R0                  DID WE SAVE &REGD ?
         BZ    MCCC&X                 NO - OK
         LR    &REGD,R0               YES - RESTORE
MCCC&X   EQU   *
&REGM    SETC  'R15'
         AIF   (T'&TMBR EQ 'O').ZZZ
         AIF   ('&TMBR'(1,1) EQ '(').GGG
         LA    &REGM,&TMBR            ADDRESS OF TARGET FIELD
         AGO   .HHH
.GGG     ANOP
&REGM    SETC  '&TMBR'(2,K'&TMBR-2)
.HHH     ANOP
         LA    R14,1(R1,R14)          BUMP TO DELIMITER
         CLI   0(R14),C'('            WAS A MEMBER FOUND ?
         BNE   MDDD&X                 NO - DONE
         LA    R14,1(R14)             FROM FIELD
         MVI   SPFTRT+C'(',X'00'      RESET TRT KEY
         MVI   SPFTRT+C')',X'FF'      SET TRT KEY
         TRT   0(10,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF MEMBER
         SR    R1,R14                 LENGTH OF MBRDSN
         BCTR  R1,R0                  DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCM&X              MOVE MBR TO TARGET FIELD
.ZZZ     ANOP
         B     MDDD&X
MVCD&X   MVC   0(0,&REGD.),0(R14)
MVCM&X   MVC   0(0,&REGM.),0(R14)
MDDD&X   DS    0H
         LA    R15,0
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY
.*    NOT BE SOLD, TRADED, OR EXCHANGED FOR CASH, SERVICES, OR AS AN
.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE
.*    INTEGRATED INTO ANY PROGRAM FOR SUCH USE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MEND

SPFDS2.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFDS2 &PRJ,&LIB,&TYP,&MBR,&TDSN,&TMBR
&NAME    DS    0H
         GBLA  &Y
         LCLC  &REGD,&REGM,&LA
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       PROJECT LIBRARY TYPE MEMBER FIELDS
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVI   FLD&Y,X'00'             INDICATE PRJ LIB TYP USED
&REGD    SETC  'R15'
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').AAA
         LA    R15,&TDSN               TARGET FIELD
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&REGD    SETC  '&TDSN'(2,K'&TDSN-2)
         LR    R15,&REGD               COPY ADDR
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,&PRJ                FROM FIELD
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT           CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'       SET TRT KEY
         MVI   SPFTRT,X'FF'            SET TRT KEY
&LA      SETC  'L''&PRJ'
         TRT   0(&LA,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF PROJECT
         BNZ   MAAA&X                  FOUND END
         LA    R1,&LA.(R14)            SET R1 TO END+1
MAAA&X   DS    0H
         SR    R1,R14                  LENGTH OF PROJECT
         BCTR  R1,R0                   DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCD&X               MOVE TO TARGET FIELD
         LA    R15,1(R1,R15)           BUMP TARGET
         MVI   0(R15),C'.'             ADD DOT
         LA    R15,1(R15)              BUMP PAST DOT
         LA    R14,&LIB                FROM FIELD
&LA      SETC  'L''&LIB'
         TRT   0(&LA,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF LIB
         BNZ   MBBB&X                  FOUND END
         LA    R1,&LA.(R14)            SET R1 TO END+1
MBBB&X   DS    0H
         SR    R1,R14                  LENGTH OF LIB
         BCTR  R1,R0                   DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCD&X               MOVE TO TARGET FIELD
         LA    R15,1(R1,R15)           BUMP TARGET
         MVI   0(R15),C'.'             ADD DOT
         LA    R15,1(R15)              BUMP PAST DOT
         LA    R14,&TYP                FROM FIELD
&LA      SETC  'L''&TYP'
         TRT   0(&LA,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF TYPE
         BNZ   MCCC&X                  FOUND END
         LA    R1,&LA.(R14)            SET R1 TO END+1
MCCC&X   DS    0H
         SR    R1,R14                  LENGTH OF TYPE
         BCTR  R1,R0                   DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCD&X               MOVE TO TARGET FIELD
         AIF   (T'&MBR EQ 'O').ZZZ
         LA    R14,&MBR                FROM FIELD
&REGM    SETC  'R15'
         AIF   ('&TMBR'(1,1) EQ '(').CCC
         LA    R15,&TMBR               TARGET FIELD
         AGO   .DDD
.CCC     ANOP
&REGM    SETC  '&TMBR'(2,K'&TMBR-2)
         LR    R15,&REGM               TARGET FIELD
.DDD     ANOP
&LA      SETC  'L''&MBR'
         TRT   0(&LA,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF MBR
         BNZ   MDDD&X                  FOUND END
         LA    R1,&LA.(R14)            SET R1 TO END+1
MDDD&X   DS    0H
         SR    R1,R14                  LENGTH OF MBR
         BNP   MZZZ&X                  NO MEMBER NAME
         BCTR  R1,R0                   DECR FOR 'EX'
         EX    R1,MVCM&X               MOVE TO TARGET FIELD
.ZZZ     ANOP
         B     MZZZ&X
MVCD&X   MVC   0(0,R15),0(R14)
MVCM&X   MVC   0(0,R15),0(R14)
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
         LA    R15,0
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY
.*    NOT BE SOLD, TRADED, OR EXCHANGED FOR CASH, SERVICES, OR AS AN
.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE
.*    INTEGRATED INTO ANY PROGRAM FOR SUCH USE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MEND

SPFDS4.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFDS4 &TDSN,&TMBR
&NAME    DS    0H
         GBLA  &Y
         LCLC  &REGD,&REGM
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       BLDL FOR THE MEMBER
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&REGM    SETC  'R2'
         AIF   ('&TMBR'(1,1) EQ '(').AAA
         LA    &REGM,&TMBR             ADDR OF MEMBER NAME
         AGO    .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&REGM    SETC  '&TMBR'(2,K'&TMBR-2)
.BBB     ANOP
         CLI   0(&REGM),C' '           MEMBER ?
         BNH   MBBB&X                  NO - SKIP BLDL
         SPFALLOC A,FREE='CLOSE',RETDD=SPFDBWRD,DSN=&TDSN,DISP='SHR'
         MVC   SPFBDCB+40(8),SPFDBWRD  MOVE DDNAME TO DCB
         CLC   SPFDYN15,=4C'0'         ALLOCATED OK ?
         BE    MAAA&X                  YES - OK
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         LA    R15,20                  SET RETURN CODE
         MVC   SMSG(20),=C'BLDL DATA SET IN USE'
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=C'0210'       DATA SET IN USE ?
         BE    MBBB&X                  YES - OK
         LA    R15,28                  ALL OTHER ERRORS
         MVC   SMSG(22),=C'BLDL ALLOCATION FAILED'
         B     MBBB&X                  EXIT
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SPFBMBR,0(&REGM)        MOVE MBR NAME TO BLDL LIST
         OPEN  SPFBDCB                 OPEN THE PDS
         BLDL  SPFBDCB,SPFBLIST
         ST    R15,SPFRC               SAVE RETURN CODE
         CLOSE SPFBDCB
         L     R15,SPFRC               PICK UP BLDL RETURN CODE
         LTR   R15,R15                 OK ?
         BZ    MBBB&X                  YES - EXIT
         LA    R15,4                   NO - SET RETURN CODE
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   SMSG(16),=C'MEMBER NOT FOUND'
         MVC   LMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   LMSG(7),=C'MEMBER='
         MVC   LMSG+7(8),0(&REGM)      MOVE MBR
MBBB&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY

SPFEDIT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFEDIT  &IDS,&MBR,&VOL,&PAN,&IMAC,&PROF,&ZEDCMD=NOCOPY,&VER=2
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO INVOKES SPF EDIT FOR A DATA SET OR A DATA SET AND
.*       MEMBER
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLC  &LIT,&REG1,&LA
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         MVC   SPFPROF,BLANKS     CLEAR
         MVC   SPFEPAN,BLANKS     CLEAR
         MVC   SPFIMAC,BLANKS     CLEAR
         MVC   SPFVOL,BLANKS      CLEAR
         MVC   SPFDYNAM,BLANKS    CLEAR
         MVI   SPFDYNAM,X'7D'     ADD A QUOTE
         AIF   ('&IDS'(1,1) EQ '''').AAA
         AIF   ('&IDS'(1,1) EQ '(').REG1
&LA      SETC  'L''&IDS'
         MVC   SPFDYNAM+1(&LA),&IDS MOVE DSN
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&IDS'(2,K'&IDS-2)
         MVC   SPFDYNAM+1(54),=CL54'&LIT' MOVE DSN
         AGO   .BBB
.REG1    ANOP
&REG     SETC  '&IDS'(2,K'&IDS-2)
         MVC   SPFDYNAM+1(54),0(&REG)   MOVE DSN
.BBB     ANOP
         LA    R14,SPFDYNAM       START OF FIELD
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   0(56,R14),SPFTRT   FIND END
         BNZ   MAAA&X
         LA    R1,55(R14)         END OF DSN
MAAA&X   EQU   *
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   (T'&MBR EQ 'O').EEE
         MVI   0(R1),C'('         ADD A PAREN
         LA    R14,1(R1)          BUMP
         AIF   ('&MBR'(1,1) EQ '''').CCC
         AIF   ('&MBR'(1,1) EQ '(').REG2
         CLI   &MBR,C' '          ANY SPECIFIED ?
         BNH   MCCC&X             NO - SKIP IT
&LA      SETC  'L''&MBR'
         MVC   0(&LA,R14),&MBR    MOVE MBR NAME
         AGO   .DDD
.CCC     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&MBR'(2,K'&MBR-2)
         MVC   0(8,R14),=CL8'&LIT'  MOVE MBR NAME
         AGO   .DDD
.REG2    ANOP
&REG     SETC  '&MBR'(2,K'&MBR-2)
         MVC   SPFDYNAM+1(54),0(&REG)   MOVE DSN
.DDD     ANOP
         TRT   0(8,R14),SPFTRT    FIND END
         BNZ   MBBB&X
         LA    R1,8(R14)          END OF MBR
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         MVI   0(R1),C')'         ADD A PAREN
         LA    R1,1(R1)           BUMP
MCCC&X   EQU   *
.EEE     ANOP
         MVI   0(R1),X'7D'        ADD ENDING QUOTE
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   (T'&VOL EQ 'O').FFF
         MVC   SPFVOL,&VOL        COPY VOLSER
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.FFF     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').GGG
         MVC   SPFEPAN,&PAN       COPY PANEL NAME
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.GGG     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&IMAC EQ 'O').HHH
         MVC   SPFIMAC,&IMAC      COPY IMACRO
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.HHH     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&PROF EQ 'O').III
         MVC   SPFPROF,&PROF      COPY PROFILE
.*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.III     ANOP
         AIF   ('&VER' NE '2').NOTVER2
MLPA&X   EQU   *
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDREC,INIT),VL
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDREC,QUERY),VL
         LTR   R15,R15            IS THERE A RECOVERY PENDING ?
         BZ    MYYY&X             NO - OK
         SPFSPLAY 'ISREDM02',,,,MFFF&X
         AIF   ('&ZEDCMD' EQ 'NOCOPY').JJJ
         SPFVCOPY (ZEDCMD,1),DC=NO
.JJJ     ANOP
         CLI   ZEDCMD,C' '        PROCESS ?
         BE    MDDD&X             YES - PROCESS RECOVERY
         CLI   ZEDCMD,C'C'        CANCEL ?
         BE    MEEE&X             YES - CANCEL RECOVERY
         CLI   ZEDCMD,C'D'        DEFER ?
         BE    MFFF&X             YES - DEFER RECOVERY
MDDD&X   EQU   *                  FALL THRU TO PROCESS, SHOULD NOT OCR
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDREC,PROCESS),VL
         B     MLPA&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *                  FALL THRU TO PROCESS, SHOULD NOT OCR
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDREC,CANCEL),VL
         B     MLPA&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *                  FALL THRU TO PROCESS, SHOULD NOT OCR
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDREC,DEFER),VL
         B     MLPA&X
MYYY&X   DS    0H
.NOTVER2 ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(EDIT,SPFDYNAM,SPFVOL,SPFPSWD,SPFEPAN,SPFIMAC,  +
               SPFPROF),VL                                        @MK
         B     MZZZ&X
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

.*    INCENTIVE FOR SERVICES AND/OR OTHER PURCHASES, NOR MAY IT BE

.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

         MEND

SPFENQ.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFENQ &SPFEDIT,&SPFDSN,&DSN,&MBR
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*   THE MEMBER IS ENQUEUED EXCLUSIVELY -
.*
.*   QNAME - &SPFEDIT                        @MK ALLOW SYMBOLIC QNAME
.*   RNAME - DATA SET NAME...       MEMBER
.*
.*   THE MEMBER NAME STARTS AT OFFSET +44 IN THE RNAME
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*   THE DATA SET IS ENQUEUED EXCLUSIVELY DURING A SAVE -
.*
.*   QNAME - &SPFEDIT
.*   RNAME - (DATA SET NAME)
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT,&REG,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        COPY DSNAME TO RNAME AREA
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(255),BLANKS     CLEAR
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(44),&DSN        COPY DSN
         AIF   (T'&SPFEDIT EQ 'O').CCC
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        ENQ   SPFEDIT   DSNAME       MBR
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   (T'&MBR EQ 'O').AAA
         MVC   SPFDYNAM+44(L'&MBR),&MBR   COPY MBR NAME
&LMBR    SETA  44+L'&MBR
         ENQ   (&SPFEDIT,SPFDYNAM,E,&LMBR,SYSTEMS),RET=USE
*    @MK CHANGED ENQ TO ALLOW SYMBOLIC QNAME AND VARIABLE LENGTH RNAME
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         ENQ   (&SPFEDIT,SPFDYNAM,E,52,SYSTEMS),RET=USE     @MK
.BBB     ANOP
         LTR   R15,R15
         BNZ   MZZZ&X
.CCC     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&SPFDSN EQ 'O').DDD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        ENQ   SPFEDIT   DSNAME
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         ENQ   (&SPFEDIT,SPFDYNAM,E,44,SYSTEMS)        @MK
.DDD     ANOP
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.

SPFEXIT.text:
MACRO
&LABEL   SPFEXIT &RC
&LABEL   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         L     R13,4(R13)          GET BACK CHAIN POINTER
         ST    R15,16(R13)         SAVE REGISTER 15 (RETCODE)
         LM    R14,R12,12(R13)     RESTORE CALLERS REGS
         AIF   (T'&RC EQ 'O').NORC
         LA    R15,&RC             SET RETURN CODE
.NORC    ANOP
         BR    R14                 RETURN TO CALLER
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*

SPFINIT.text:
MACRO
&LABEL   SPFINIT  &USER=N,&TIME=N,&TERM=N,&TABLES=N,&ERRORS=RETURN,    X
               &SPF=Y
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO PERFORMS VARIOUS INITIALIZATION FUNCTIONS FOR AN
.*       SPF DIALOG MANAGER.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &N,&D,&B,&X
R0       EQU   0
R1       EQU   1
R2       EQU   2
R3       EQU   3
R4       EQU   4
R5       EQU   5
R6       EQU   6
R7       EQU   7
R8       EQU   8
R9       EQU   9
R10      EQU   10
R11      EQU   11
R12      EQU   12
R13      EQU   13
R14      EQU   14
R15      EQU   15
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&LABEL   CSECT
         B     68(R15)             BRANCH AROUND
         DC    CL8'&LABEL'         CSECT NAME
         DC    C'-'
         DC    CL8'&SYSDATE'       COMPILE DATE
         DC    C'-'
         DC    CL8'&SYSTIME'       COMPILE TIME
         DC    CL38'NASPA PUBLIC DOMAIN LIBRARY'
         CNOP  0,4                 ALIGNMENT
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         STM   R14,R12,12(R13)     SAVE REGISTERS
&N       SETA  N'&SYSLIST
&D       SETA  1
&B       SETA  0
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         AIF   (&N NE 0).AAA
         MNOTE 8,'BASE REGISTER MISSING'
         MEXIT
.AAA     ANOP
         USING &LABEL,&SYSLIST(&D)
         LR    &SYSLIST(&D),R15    FIRST BASE REGISTER
.BBB     ANOP
&B       SETA  &B+4096
&D       SETA  &D+1
         AIF   (&D EQ &N+1).CCC
         USING &LABEL+&B,&SYSLIST(&D)
         LA    &SYSLIST(&D),2048(&SYSLIST(&D-1))
         LA    &SYSLIST(&D),2048(&SYSLIST(&D))
         AGO   .BBB
.CCC     CNOP  0,4
         B     *+76
SAVE&X   DC    18F'0'
         ST    R13,SAVE&X+4        SAVE BACK CHAIN
         MVC   8(4,R13),=A(SAVE&X) SET FORWARD CHAIN
         LA    R13,SAVE&X          THIS SAVE AREA
         AIF   ('&SPF' EQ 'N').NOSPF
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       STANDARD VARIABLES FOR SPF
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         SPFVDEF 24,(SMSG)
         SPFVDEF 72,(LMSG)
         SPFVDEF 60,(ZCMD)
         SPFVDEF 1,(ZEDCMD),DC=NO
         AIF   ('&USER' EQ 'N').NOUSER
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       USER RELATED VARIABLES   CODE:  USER=Y
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         SPFVDEF 44,(ZTEMPF)
         SPFVDEF 8,(ZPREFIX,ZUSER,ZLOGON)
         SPFVDEF 4,(ZAPPLID)
         SPFVGET (ZTEMPF,ZPREFIX,ZUSER,ZLOGON,ZAPPLID),SHARED
.NOUSER  ANOP
         AIF   ('&TIME' EQ 'N').NOTIME
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       DATE/TIME VARIABLES      CODE:  TIME=Y
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         SPFVDEF 8,(ZDATE)
         SPFVDEF 6,(ZJDATE)
         SPFVDEF 5,(ZTIME)
         SPFVDEF 2,(ZMONTH,ZDAY,ZYEAR)
         SPFVGET (ZDATE,ZJDATE,ZTIME,ZMONTH,ZDAY,ZYEAR),SHARED
.NOTIME  ANOP
         AIF   ('&TERM' EQ 'N').NOTERM
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       TERMINAL VARIABLES       CODE:  TERM=Y
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         SPFVDEF 4,(ZTERM)
         SPFVDEF 2,(ZKEYS)
         SPFVDEF 48,(ZPF01,ZPF02,ZPF03,ZPF04,ZPF05,ZPF06,ZPF07,ZPF08,  +
               ZPF09,ZPF10,ZPF11,ZPF12,                                +
               ZPF13,ZPF14,ZPF15,ZPF16,ZPF17,ZPF18,ZPF19,ZPF20,        +
               ZPF21,ZPF22,ZPF23,ZPF24)
.NOTERM  ANOP
         AIF   ('&TABLES' EQ 'N').NOTBL
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       TABLE VARIABLES          CODE:  TABLES=Y
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         SPFVDEF 4,(CRP),TYPE=FIXED,DC=NO
         SPFVDEF 4,(ZSCROLLA,ZSCROLLN,ZSCROLLD)
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.NOTBL   ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(CONTROL,ERRORS,&ERRORS),VL
.NOSPF   ANOP
MAAA&X   DS    0H
         L     R1,4(R13)           RESTORE BACK CHAIN POINTER
         L     R1,24(R1)           RESTORE REG 1 FROM SAVE AREA
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

SPFJOBNM.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFJOBNM &CRD
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL BUMP THE JOBNAME SUFFIX BY 1, IF THE JOBNAME
.*       MATCHES THE USER-ID
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        UPDATE THE JOB CARD
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         LA    R1,ZUSER           ADDR OF USER-ID
         LA    R14,7              MAX LENGTH
LPA&X    EQU   *
         CLI   0(R1),C' '         END ?
         BE    MAAA&X             YES - OK
         LA    R1,1(R1)           BUMP
         BCT   R14,LPA&X
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R15,6              MAX-1
         SR    R15,R14            LENGTH OF ID-1
         EX    R15,CLCI&X         JOBNAME = TO USER-ID
         BNE   MFFF&X             NO - OK
         LA    R1,&CRD+2          JOBCARD
         LA    R1,1(R1,R15)       BUMP TO LAST CHARACTER
         CLI   0(R1),C' '         IS IT BLANK ?
         BE    MFFF&X             YES - SKIP IT
         CLI   0(R1),C'9'         IS IT 9 ?
         BNE   MBBB&X             NO - OK
         MVI   0(R1),C'0'         YES - SET TO ZERO
         B     MFFF&X
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         CLI   0(R1),C'I'         IS IT I ?
         BNE   MCCC&X             NO - OK
         MVI   0(R1),C'J'         YES - SET TO J
         B     MFFF&X
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         CLI   0(R1),C'R'         IS IT R ?
         BNE   MDDD&X             NO - OK
         MVI   0(R1),C'S'         YES - SET TO S
         B     MFFF&X
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         CLI   0(R1),C'Z'         IS IT Z ?
         BNE   MEEE&X             NO - OK
         MVI   0(R1),C'A'         YES - SET TO A
         B     MFFF&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         XR    R14,R14
         IC    R14,0(R1)          PICK UP CHARACTER
         LA    R14,1(R14)         ADD 1
         STC   R14,0(R1)          REPLACE IT
         B     MFFF&X
CLCI&X   CLC   &CRD+2(0),ZUSER
MFFF&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.
.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN

SPFLOC.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFLOC &TDSN
&NAME    DS    0H
         GBLA  &Y
         LCLC  &REGD
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       LOCATE THE CATALOG ENTRY FOR THE DATA SET
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&REGD    SETC  'R2'
         ST    R2,SPFREGS
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').AAA
         LA    &REGD,&TDSN             ADDR OF TARGET FIELD
         AGO    .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&REGD    SETC  '&TDSN'(2,K'&TDSN-2)
         MVC   DSN&X,0(&REGD)          MOVE DSN
.BBB     ANOP
         CLI   0(&REGD),C' '           DO WE HAVE A DSN ?
         BNH   MCCC&X                  NO - SKIP OBTAIN
         MVC   LMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   LMSG(4),=C'DSN='
         MVC   LMSG+4(44),0(&REGD)     MOVE DSN
         LOCATE LOC&X                  LOCATE CATALOG ENTRY
         LTR   R15,R15                 CATALOGED ?
         BZ    MAAA&X                  YES - OK
         LA    R15,12                  NO - SET RC
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   SMSG(22),=C'DATA SET NOT CATALOGED'
         B     MCCC&X
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SPFDEVT,SPFDSCB+2       PICK UP DEVICE TYPE
         MVC   SPFVOL,SPFDSCB+6        PICK UP VOL FROM LOCATE
         CLC   SPFVOL,=CL6'MIGRAT'     HAS IT BEEN MIGRATED ?
         BNE   MCCC&X                  NO - OK
         LA    R15,8                   YES - SET RC
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   SMSG(20),=C'DATA SET IS MIGRATED'
         B     MCCC&X
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').FFF
LOC&X    CAMLST  NAME,&TDSN,,SPFDSCB
         AGO   .GGG
.FFF     ANOP
LOC&X    CAMLST  NAME,DSN&X,,SPFDSCB
DSN&X    DC    CL44' '
.GGG     ANOP
MCCC&X   DS    0H
         L     R2,SPFREGS
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*

SPFOBT.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFOBT &TDSN,&VOL
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLC  &REGD
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       OBTAIN THE FORMAT 1 DSCB FOR THE DATA SET
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&REGD    SETC  'R2'
         ST    R2,SPFREGS
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').AAA
         ST    &REGD,SPFREGS
         LA    &REGD,&TDSN             ADDR OF TARGET FIELD
         AGO    .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
&REGD    SETC  '&TDSN'(2,K'&TDSN-2)
         MVC   DSN&X,0(&REGD)          MOVE DSN
.BBB     ANOP
         AIF   (T'&VOL EQ 'O').CCC
         MVC   SPFVOL,&VOL             MOVE VOL SER
.CCC     ANOP
         CLC   SPFVOL,=CL6'MIGRAT'     IS IT MIGRATED ?
         BNE   MBBB&X                  NO - OK
         LA    R15,8
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS
         MVC   SMSG(20),=C'DATA SET IS MIGRATED'
         B     MZZZ&X
MBBB&X   DS    0H
         CLI   0(&REGD),X'04'          FORMAT 4 DSN ?
         BE    MCCC&X                  YES - OK
         CLI   0(&REGD),C' '           DO WE HAVE A DSN ?
         BNH   MZZZ&X                  NO - SKIP OBTAIN
MCCC&X   DS    0H
         MVC   LMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   LMSG(4),=C'DSN='
         MVC   LMSG+4(44),0(&REGD)     MOVE DSN
         OBTAIN OBT&X                  GET THE FORMAT 1 DSCB
         LTR   R15,R15                 DATA SET FOUND ?
         BZ    MZZZ&X                  YES - OK
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS
         C     R15,=F'4'               VOLUME NOT MOUNTED ?
         BE    MDDD&X                  YES - OK
         LA    R15,16                  NO - SET RC
         MVC   SMSG(18),=C'DATA SET NOT FOUND'
         B     MZZZ&X                  YES - OK
MDDD&X   DS    0H
         LA    R15,24                   NO - SET RC
         MVC   SMSG(17),=C'VOLUME NOT MOUNTED'
         B     MZZZ&X
         AIF   ('&TDSN'(1,1) EQ '(').FFF
OBT&X    CAMLST  SEARCH,&TDSN,SPFVOL,SPFDSCB
         AGO   .GGG
.FFF     ANOP
OBT&X    CAMLST  SEARCH,DSN&X,SPFVOL,SPFDSCB
DSN&X    DC    CL44' '
.GGG     ANOP
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
         L     R2,SPFREGS
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*

.*

.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

SPFRJUST.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFRJUST &TO,&FROM
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
         LCLA  &LTO,&LFROM
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&LFROM   SETA  L'&FROM
&LTO     SETA  L'&TO
         AIF   ('&LTO' GE '&LFROM').AAA
         MNOTE 8,'*** TO FIELD MUST BE EQUAL TO OR GREATER THAN FROM '
         MEXIT
.AAA     ANOP
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        RIGHT JUSTIFY
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVC   &TO,BLANKS          INITIALIZE
         CLI   &FROM,C' '          ANY DATA ?
         BE    MZZZ&X              NO - OK
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT       CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'   SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   &FROM,SPFTRT        FIND BLANK
         BNZ   MAAA&X              FOUND IT
         LA    R1,&FROM+&LFROM     SET TO END OF FIELD
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,&FROM           START OF FIELD
         SR    R1,R14              LENGTH OF DATA
         LA    R15,&TO+&LTO        END OF FIELD
         SR    R15,R1              BACKUP LENGTH OF DATA
         BCTR  R1,R0               SUBTRACT 1 FOR 'EX' INSTRUCTION
         EX    R1,RJST&X           MOVE DATA - RIGHT JUSTIFIED
         B     MZZZ&X
RJST&X   MVC   0(0,R15),&FROM      MOVE DATA
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

SPFROW.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFROW
         GBLC  &SPF4
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO OBTAINS THE CRP (ZTDTOP) AND STORES IT IN ROW
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         AIF   ('&SPF4' EQ 'X').NODC
&SPF4    SETC  'X'
         SPFVCOPY (ZTDTOP,6)                  GET THE CRP
         AGO   .AAA
.NODC    ANOP
         SPFVCOPY (ZTDTOP,6),DC=NO            GET THE CRP
.AAA     ANOP
         CLC   ZTDTOP,BLANKS                  IS IT BLANK ?
         BNE   MAAA&X                         NO - OK
         MVC   ZTDTOP,=6C'0'                  YES - SET TO ZERO
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         PACK  SPFDBWRD,ZTDTOP                PACK IT
         CVB   R1,SPFDBWRD                    CONVERT TO BINARY
         STCM  R1,15,ROW                      SAVE IT
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,

SPFSARG.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFSARG &TBL,&FLD
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO INVOKES THE SPF TBSARG SERVICE
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS        CLEAR
         MVC   LMSG,BLANKS        CLEAR
         STM   R2,R3,SPFREGS      SAVE REGS
         LA    R3,ZCMD            ADDR OF ZCMD
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   0(12,R3),SPFTRT    FIND BLANK AFTER COMMAND
         LA    R3,0(R1)           BUMP TO FIRST BLANK
*
         MVI   SPFTRT,X'FF'       SET FOR
         MVC   SPFTRT+1(255),SPFTRT   ALL
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'00'  BUT A BLANK
         TRT   0(12,R3),SPFTRT    FIND NON-BLANK AFTER COMMAND
         BZ    MYYY&X             NO DATA, ERROR
         LA    R3,0(R1)           BUMP TO START OF STRING
*
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   0(3,R3),SPFTRT     FIND END OF STRING
         BZ    MYYY&X             INVALID VALUE
         SR    R1,R3              LENGTH OF STRING
         C     R1,=F'2'           MUST BE 2
         BNE   MYYY&X             INVALID
         MVC   CND&X,0(R3)        COPY CONDITION
         LA    R3,3(R3)           BUMP PAST COND
*
         MVI   SPFTRT,X'FF'       SET FOR
         MVC   SPFTRT+1(255),SPFTRT   ALL
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'00'  BUT A BLANK
         TRT   0(12,R3),SPFTRT    FIND NON-BLANK AFTER COND
         BZ    MYYY&X             NO DATA, ERROR
         LA    R3,0(R1)           BUMP TO START OF STRING
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBTOP,&TBL),VL
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBVCLEAR,&TBL),VL
         MVC   &FLD,0(R3)         COPY VALUE
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBSARG,&TBL,,,FLD&X),VL
         B     MZZZ&X
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
FLD&X    DC    C'(&FLD,'
CND&X    DC    CL2' '
         DC    C')'
MYYY&X   DS    0H
         MVC   SMSG,=CL24'INVALID SEARCH STRING'
         LA    R15,24
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
         LM    R2,R3,SPFREGS      RESTORE REGS
         MEND

SPFSPLAY.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFSPLAY &PAN,&MSG,&CUR,&ZERO,&NZERO
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL INVOKE THE SPF DISPLAY SERVICE FOR PANELS,
.*       AND/OR MESSAGES
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLC  &P,&M,&C,&LIT
         AIF   (T'&CUR EQ 'O').NOCUR
         AIF   ('&CUR'(1,1) NE '''').AAACUR
&LIT     SETC  '&CUR'(2,K'&CUR-2)
         MVC   CURSOR,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBCUR
.AAACUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&CUR' EQ 'CURSOR').BBBCUR
         MVC   CURSOR,&CUR
.BBBCUR  ANOP
&C       SETC  'CURSOR'
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').EEECUR
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').CCCCUR
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .DDDCUR
.CCCCUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').DDDCUR
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.DDDCUR  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
.EEECUR  ANOP
         AIF   (T'&MSG EQ 'O').HHHCUR
         AIF   ('&MSG'(1,1) NE '''').FFFCUR
&LIT     SETC  '&MSG'(2,K'&MSG-2)
         MVC   MSG,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .GGGCUR
.FFFCUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MSG' EQ 'MSG').GGGCUR
         MVC   MSG,&MSG
.GGGCUR  ANOP
&M       SETC  'MSG'
.HHHCUR  ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(DISPLAY,&P,&M,&C),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.NOCUR   ANOP
         AIF   (T'&MSG EQ 'O').NOMSG
         AIF   ('&MSG'(1,1) NE '''').AAAMSG
&LIT     SETC  '&MSG'(2,K'&MSG-2)
         MVC   MSG,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBMSG
.AAAMSG  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MSG' EQ 'MSG').BBBMSG
         MVC   MSG,&MSG
.BBBMSG  ANOP
&M       SETC  'MSG'
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').EEEMSG
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').CCCMSG
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .DDDMSG
.CCCMSG  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').DDDMSG
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.DDDMSG  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
.EEEMSG  ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(DISPLAY,&P,&M),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.NOMSG   ANOP
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').NOPAN
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').AAAPAN
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBPAN
.AAAPAN  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').BBBPAN
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.BBBPAN  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
         CALL  ISPLINK,(DISPLAY,&P),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.NOPAN   ANOP
         MNOTE 8,'*** PANEL, MESSAGE, AND CURSOR NOT SPECIFIED'
         AGO   .ZZZ
.XXX     ANOP
         LTR   R15,R15
         AIF   ('&NZERO' EQ '').YYY
         BNZ   &NZERO
.YYY     ANOP
         AIF   ('&ZERO' EQ '').ZZZ
         BZ    &ZERO
.ZZZ     ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*

SPFSUB.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFSUB  &DSN,&MBR
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL INVOKE THE TSO SUBMIT COMMAND FOR A
.*       SEQUENTIAL DATA SET OR A PDS AND MEMBER.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        SUBMIT THE JOB
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(256),BLANKS   SET TO BLANKS
         LA    R14,SPFDYNAM
         MVC   0(11,R14),=C'CMD(SUBMIT '
         LA    R14,11(R14)            BUMP
         MVI   0(R14),X'7D'           ADD A QUOTE
         LA    R14,1(R14)             BUMP
         MVC   0(44,R14),&DSN         MOVE THE DSN
         AIF   (T'&MBR EQ 'O').AAA
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT          CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'      SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   0(45,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF DSN
         LR    R14,R1                 COPY ADDR
         MVI   0(R14),C'('            ADD THE PAREN
         MVC   1(8,R14),&MBR          MOVE THE MEMBER NAME
         TRT   0(10,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END
         MVI   0(R1),C')'             ADD A PAREN
         MVI   1(R1),X'7D'            ADD A QUOTE
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT          CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'      SET FOR A BLANK
         TRT   0(45,R14),SPFTRT       FIND END OF DSN
         MVI   0(R1),X'7D'            ADD A QUOTE
.BBB     ANOP
         MVC   SPFDYNIN,=F'100'
         CALL  ISPLINK,(SELECT,SPFDYNIN,SPFDYNAM),VL
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.

SPFTAILR.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTAILR &PROC,&SUBMIT,&JOBCARD=
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL INVOKE SPF FILE TAILORING SERVICES AND
.*       OPTIONALLY SUBMIT THE JOB. IT WILL ALSO UPDATE THE JOBNAME
.*       SUFFIX IF REQUESTED.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LIT
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         AIF   (T'&PROC NE 'O').AAA
         MNOTE 8,'SPF SKELETON NOT SPECIFIED'
         MEXIT
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&PROC'(1,1) EQ '''').BBB
         MVC   PROC,&PROC           MOVE SKELETON NAME
         AGO   .CCC
.BBB     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&PROC'(2,K'&PROC-2)
         MVC   PROC,=CL8'&LIT'
.CCC     ANOP
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT        CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'
         TRT   ZPREFIX,SPFTRT       FIND END OF USER-PREFIX
         BNZ   MAAA&X
         LA    R1,ZPREFIX+8
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,ZPREFIX         START OF USER-PREFIX
         SR    R1,R14              LENGTH OF USER-PREFIX
         LA    R14,ZTEMPF          START OF ZTEMPF
         SH    R1,=H'1'            DECR FOR EX
         EX    R1,CLC1&X           COMPARE USER-PREFIX TO ZTEMPF
         BE    MEEE&X              ZTEMPF IS A REAL NAME
         TRT   ZUSER,SPFTRT        FIND END OF USER-ID
         BNZ   MBBB&X
         LA    R1,ZUSER+8
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         LA    R15,ZUSER           START OF USER-ID
         SR    R1,R15              LENGTH OF USER-ID
         SH    R1,=H'1'            LENGTH OF USER-ID
LPA&X    EQU   *
         LA    R14,1(R14)          BUMP
         EX    R1,CLC2&X           FIND USER-ID IMBEDDED IN ZTEMPF
         BE    MCCC&X              FOUND IT
         B     LPA&X
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SUBD&X,BLANKS       CLEAR
         MVC   SUBD&X.(18),0(R14)   MOVE USER-ID + ANOTHER QUALIFIER
         LA    R14,SUBD&X           START OF NAME
         LA    R14,2(R1,R14)        BUMP PAST USER-ID AND DOT
         MVC   0(7,R14),=C'SPFTEMP'  ADD THIS QUALIFIER
         TRT   SUBD&X,SPFTRT        FIND END OF DSN
         MVC   0(6,R1),=C'.TEMP1'   ADD ANOTHER QUALIFIER
         SPFALLOC A,DD='ISPFILE',DSN=SUBD&X,DISP='SHR',                +
               LRECL='80',BLKSIZE='6160',RECFM='FB'
         CLC   SPFDYNER,=4C'0'
         BE    MDDD&X
         SPFALLOC A,DD='ISPFILE',DSN=SUBD&X,DISP='(NEW,CATLG)',        +
               LRECL='80',BLKSIZE='6160',RECFM='FB',                   +
               SPACE='(6160,(10,10),RLSE)'
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         CALL  ISPLINK,(FTOPEN),VL
         B     MFFF&X
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SUBD&X,ZTEMPF
         CALL  ISPLINK,(FTOPEN,TEMP),VL
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         CALL  ISPLINK,(FTINCL,PROC),VL
         ST    R15,SPFRC
         CALL  ISPLINK,(FTCLOSE),VL
         CLC   SUBD&X,ZTEMPF             SAME DSN ?
         BE    MGGG&X                    YES - SKIP UN-ALLOCATE
         SPFALLOC U,DD='ISPFILE'
MGGG&X   EQU   *
         L     R15,SPFRC
         LTR   R15,R15
         AIF   (T'&SUBMIT EQ 'O').DONE
         BNZ   MZZZ&X
         SPFSUB SUBD&X
         AIF   (T'&JOBCARD EQ 'O').DONE
         SPFJOBNM &JOBCARD
.DONE    ANOP
         B     MZZZ&X
CLC1&X   CLC   0(0,R14),ZPREFIX    COMPARE
CLC2&X   CLC   0(0,R14),ZUSER      COMPARE
SUBD&X   DC    CL44' '
MZZZ&X   EQU   *
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*

.*    RECIPIENTS ARE FREE TO MAKE THIS MACRO AVAILABLE TO OTHERS IN
.*    LIKE MANNER, PROVIDED THIS DISCLAIMER IS KEPT INTACT.  IT MAY

SPFTBCR.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTBCR &TBL,&KEY,&FLD,&WRT,&REPL
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO INVOKES THE SPF TBCREATE SERVICE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X,&B,&N,&LL
&N       SETA  N'&FLD
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         AIF   (T'&REPL EQ 'O').NOREPL
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBCREATE,&TBL,KEY&X,FLD&X,&WRT,&REPL),VL
         AGO   .XYZ
.NOREPL  ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBCREATE,&TBL,KEY&X,FLD&X,&WRT),VL
.XYZ     ANOP
         B     MAAA&X
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
&B       SETA  1
         AIF   (&N GT 1).BBB
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(1)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(1))'
         AGO   .EEE
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
.BBB     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(&B)'
.CCC     ANOP
&B       SETA  &B+1
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).DDD
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B)'
         AGO   .CCC
.DDD     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B))'
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.EEE     ANOP
&N       SETA  N'&KEY
&B       SETA  1
         AIF   (&N GT 1).FFF
&LL      SETA  K'&KEY(1)+2
KEY&X    DC    CL&LL'(&KEY(1))'
         AGO   .III
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
.FFF     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&KEY(&B)+2
KEY&X    DC    CL&LL'(&KEY(&B)'
.GGG     ANOP
&B       SETA  &B+1
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).HHH
&LL      SETA  K'&KEY(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&KEY(&B)'
         AGO   .GGG
.HHH     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&KEY(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&KEY(&B))'
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.III     ANOP
.DONE    ANOP
MAAA&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.
.*
.*    THIS MACRO IS MADE AVAILABLE BY NASPA WITHOUT CHARGE.

SPFTBDIS.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTBDIS &TBL,&PAN,&MSG,&CUR,&ROW
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL INVOKE THE SPF TABLE DISPLAY SERVICE
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         LCLC  &P,&M,&C,&LIT
         AIF   (T'&CUR EQ 'O').NOCUR
         AIF   ('&CUR'(1,1) NE '''').AAACUR
&LIT     SETC  '&CUR'(2,K'&CUR-2)
         MVC   CURSOR,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBCUR
.AAACUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&CUR' EQ 'CURSOR').BBBCUR
         MVC   CURSOR,&CUR
.BBBCUR  ANOP
&C       SETC  'CURSOR'
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').EEECUR
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').CCCCUR
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .DDDCUR
.CCCCUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').DDDCUR
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.DDDCUR  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
.EEECUR  ANOP
         AIF   (T'&MSG EQ 'O').HHHCUR
         AIF   ('&MSG'(1,1) NE '''').FFFCUR
&LIT     SETC  '&MSG'(2,K'&MSG-2)
         MVC   MSG,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .GGGCUR
.FFFCUR  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MSG' EQ 'MSG').GGGCUR
         MVC   MSG,&MSG
.GGGCUR  ANOP
&M       SETC  'MSG'
.HHHCUR  ANOP
         CLI   &C,C' '
         BH    MAAA&X
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBDISPL,&TBL,&P,&M),VL
         B     MBBB&X
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBDISPL,&TBL,&P,&M,&C,&ROW),VL
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         AGO   .XXX
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.NOCUR   ANOP
         AIF   (T'&MSG EQ 'O').NOMSG
         AIF   ('&MSG'(1,1) NE '''').AAAMSG
&LIT     SETC  '&MSG'(2,K'&MSG-2)
         MVC   MSG,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBMSG
.AAAMSG  ANOP
         AIF   ('&MSG' EQ 'MSG').BBBMSG
         MVC   MSG,&MSG
.BBBMSG  ANOP
&M       SETC  'MSG'
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').EEEMSG
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').CCCMSG
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .DDDMSG
.CCCMSG  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').DDDMSG
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.DDDMSG  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
.EEEMSG  ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBDISPL,&TBL,&P,&M),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.*------------------------------------------------------------------
.NOMSG   ANOP
         AIF   (T'&PAN EQ 'O').NOPAN
         AIF   ('&PAN'(1,1) NE '''').AAAPAN
&LIT     SETC  '&PAN'(2,K'&PAN-2)
         MVC   PANEL,=CL8'&LIT'
         AGO   .BBBPAN
.AAAPAN  ANOP
         AIF   ('&PAN' EQ 'PANEL').BBBPAN
         MVC   PANEL,&PAN
.BBBPAN  ANOP
&P       SETC  'PANEL'
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBDISPL,&TBL,&P),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.NOPAN   ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBDISPL,&TBL),VL
         AGO   .XXX
.XXX     ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*

SPFTBL#.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTBL# &PREF=CMN,&COPY=NO
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO OBTAINS A 5 DIGIT SEQ NUMBER FROM THE PROFILE.
.*       THE NUMBER IS MAINLY USED FOR VIRTUAL TABLES, HOWEVER, IT
.*       MAY BE USED FOR ANYTHING YOU WISH.
.*       @MK - MADE TABLE NUMBER VARIABLE NAME VARIABLE
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
*        TABLE NUMBER
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&COPY' EQ 'YES').AAA
         SPFVDEF 5,(&PREF.TBL#)
         SPFVGET (&PREF.TBL#),PROFILE
         AGO   .BBB
.AAA     ANOP
         SPFVCOPY (&PREF.TBL#,5)
.BBB     ANOP
         OI    &PREF.TBL#+4,X'F0'    INSURE NUMERIC
         PACK  SPFDBWRD,&PREF.TBL#   PACK IT
         AP    SPFDBWRD,=P'1'     ADD 1
         UNPK  &PREF.TBL#,SPFDBWRD+5(3)   UNPACK IT
         OI    &PREF.TBL#+4,X'F0'    SET SIGN
         AIF   ('&COPY' EQ 'NO').CCC
         SPFVREPL (&PREF.TBL#,5)
.CCC     ANOP
         SPFVPUT (&PREF.TBL#),PROFILE
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY

SPFTBLOC.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTBLOC &TBL,&KEY1,&KEY2,&KEY3,&START=X,&LREPL=NO
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &LL
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO LOCATES A KEY FIELD IN A TABLE
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
*----------------------------------------------------------------------
         AIF   ('&START' NE 'TOP').NOTOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBTOP,&TBL),VL
.NOTOP   ANOP
         MVC   SMSG,BLANKS             CLEAR
         MVC   CURSOR,BLANKS           CLEAR
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT           CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'       SET FOR BLANK
         TRT   ZCMD,SPFTRT             FIND FIRST BLANK AFTER COMMAND
         BNZ   MAAA&X                  FOUND IT
         MVC   SMSG,=CL24'INVALID COMMAND'
         NI    FLAG&X,X'FF'-BODR&X     TURN OFF FLAG
         B     MZZZ&X                  EXIT
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LR    R3,R1                   SAVE ADDR OF BLANK
         MVI   SPFTRT,X'FF'            TURN ON ALL TRT BYTES
         MVC   SPFTRT+1(255),SPFTRT
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'00'       TURN OFF BLANK
         TRT   0(45,R3),SPFTRT         FIND START OF DATA
         BNZ   MBBB&X                  FOUND IT
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBSKIP,&TBL),VL
         B     MCCC&X                  PROCESS REPEAT FIND
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         NI    FLAG&X,X'FF'-BODR&X     TURN OFF FLAG&X
         MVC   MSV1&X.(44),0(R1)       ISOLATE DATA FOLLOWING COMMAND
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT           CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'       SET FOR BLANK
         TRT   MSV1&X,SPFTRT           FIND FIRST BLANK AFTER DATA
         MVI   0(R1),C'*'              DO A GENERIC SEARCH ON DATA
         AIF   (T'&KEY2 EQ 'O').NOKY23
         MVC   MSV2&X.(L'&KEY2),&KEY2  SAVE SEARCH ARG &KEY2
         AIF   (T'&KEY3 EQ 'O').NOKY23
         MVC   MSV3&X.(L'&KEY3),&KEY3  SAVE SEARCH ARG &KEY2
.NOKY23  ANOP
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         AIF   ('&START' EQ 'TOP').TOP
         SPFTBLRS &TBL                 SET ROW
.TOP     ANOP
         TM    FLAG&X,BODR&X           BOT OF DATA ON PREV ?
         BZ    MDDD&X                  NO - OK
         NI    FLAG&X,X'FF'-BODR&X     TURN OFF FLAG&X
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBTOP,&TBL),VL
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         MVC   KEYS&X,BLANKS           CLEAR
         MVC   KEYS&X.(30),=CL30'(&KEY1 &KEY2 &KEY3)' SEARCH KEY
         MVC   &KEY1,MSV1&X            MOVE SEARCH ARG TO &KEY1
         AIF   ('&LREPL' EQ 'NO').NOREP1
&LL      SETC  'L''&KEY1'
         SPFVREPL (&KEY1,&LL)
.NOREP1  ANOP
         AIF   (T'&KEY2 EQ 'O').NOKEY23
         MVC   &KEY2,MSV2&X            MOVE SEARCH ARG TO &KEY2
         AIF   ('&LREPL' EQ 'NO').NOREP2
&LL      SETC  'L''&KEY2'
         SPFVREPL (&KEY2,&LL)
.NOREP2  ANOP
         AIF   (T'&KEY3 EQ 'O').NOKEY23
         MVC   &KEY3,MSV3&X            MOVE SEARCH ARG TO &KEY3
         AIF   ('&LREPL' EQ 'NO').NOREP3
&LL      SETC  'L''&KEY3'
         SPFVREPL (&KEY3,&LL)
.NOREP3  ANOP
.NOKEY23 ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBSCAN,&TBL,KEYS&X),VL     SEARCH THE TABLE
         MVC   SMSG(6),=CL6'CHARS'     SET SMSG
         MVC   SMSG+6(18),MSV1&X       "
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT           CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C'*',X'FF'       SET TO "*"
         TRT   SMSG+6(18),SPFTRT       FIND THE "*" WE ADDED
         BZ    MEEE&X                  BEYOND LENGTH OF SMSG
         MVI   0(R1),C' '              REMOVE THE "*"
         LA    R2,SMSG+23              END OF SMSG
         SR    R2,R1                   LENGTH REMAINING
         BNP   MEEE&X                  NONE
         EX    R2,MVCM&X               MOVE REST OF MESSAGE
MEEE&X   EQU   *
         LTR   R15,R15                 WAS THE SEARCH SUCCESSFUL ?
         BZ    MFFF&X                  YES - OK
         SPFTBLRS &TBL                 NO - RESET ROW
         MVC   SMSG,=CL24'*BOTTOM OF DATA REACHED*'
         MVC   ROW,=F'0'               SET TO ZERO
         OI    FLAG&X,BODR&X           INDICATE BOT OF DATA
         B     MZZZ&X
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         MVC   CURSOR,=CL8'&KEY1'
         SPFCRP &TBL
         MVC   ROW,CRP
         B     MZZZ&X
MVCM&X   MVC   1(0,R1),=CL20'FOUND'
KEYS&X   DC    CL40' '
MSV1&X   DC    CL40' '
MSV2&X   DC    CL40' '
MSV3&X   DC    CL40' '
FLAG&X   DC    X'00'
BODR&X   EQU   X'80'
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*    THIS MACRO HAS MET A BASIC SET OF PROGRAMMING AND
.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*
.*    NASPA MAKES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, OF THE FITNESS
.*    FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AS RELATES TO THE DOCUMENTATION,
.*    FUNCTION, RESULTS, OR PERFORMANCE OF THIS MACRO.
.*
.*    IMPLEMENTATION AND USE OF THIS MACRO CONSTITUTES A RELEASE
.*    FROM LIABILITY OF NASPA FOR ANY PROBLEMS ARISING FROM THE USE OF
.*    THIS MACRO AT THE USER'S INSTALLATION.

SPFTBLRS.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTBLRS &TBL
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO REPOSITIONS THE TABLE TO THE CURRENT ROW
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         SPFROW                               GET ZTDTOP INTO ROW
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBTOP,&TBL),VL        POSITION TO TOP

SPFTCNT1.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTCNT1
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS IS THE MACRO 1 OF 2
.*
.*       THIS  MACRO IS USED TO DISPLAY AN 'IN PROCESS' TABLE
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         ZAP   COUNT,=P'-1'       INITIALIZE
         ZAP   TOTAL,=P'0'        INITIALIZE
         SPFTBL# COPY=YES
         MVC   COUNTBL(3),=C'RDM'
         MVC   COUNTBL+3(5),CMNTBL#
         SPFVDEF 10,(CMNCOUNT)
         SPFVDEF 40,(CMNHEAD)
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBCREATE,COUNTBL,,NAMES),VL

SPFTCNT2.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTCNT2
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS IS THE MACRO 2 OF 2
.*
.*       THIS  MACRO IS USED TO DISPLAY AN 'IN PROCESS' TABLE
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
         AP    COUNT,=P'1'
         CP    COUNT,=P'0'        FIRST TIME ?
         BE    MAAA&X             YES - OK
         CP    COUNT,=P'25'       SHOULD WE DISPLAY NOW ?
         BL    EXIT990            NO - OK
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         AP    TOTAL,COUNT        ADD TO TOTAL
         ZAP   COUNT,=P'0'        RESET
         MVC   CMNCOUNT,=X'40202020202020202120'
         ED    CMNCOUNT,TOTAL
         CALL  ISPLINK,(TBADD,COUNTBL),VL
         CALL  ISPLINK,(CONTROL,DISPLAY,LOCK),VL
         SPFTBDIS COUNTBL,'COUNT01'
         B     MZZZ&X
NAMES    DC    CL12'(CMNCOUNT)'
COUNTBL  DC    CL8' '
COUNT    DC    PL5'0'
TOTAL    DC    PL5'0'
MZZZ&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

SPFTEMP.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFTEMP &IDS,&ODS,&QUAL
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO WILL GENERATE A DATA SET NAME FROM A USER SUPPLIED
.*       BASE NAME BY CHANGING THE LAST QUALIFIER OF THE BASE NAME.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X
         LCLC  &INDS,&LIT,&LA
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&INDS    SETC  '&IDS'
         AIF   (T'&IDS NE 'O').AAA
&INDS    SETC  'SPFDYNAM'
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT        CLEAR
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'
         TRT   ZPREFIX,SPFTRT       FIND END OF USER ID
         BNZ   MAAA&X
         LA    R1,ZPREFIX+8
MAAA&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,ZPREFIX         START OF USER PREFIX
         SR    R1,R14              LENGTH OF USER PREFIX
         LA    R14,ZTEMPF          START OF ZTEMPF
         SH    R1,=H'1'            DECR FOR EX
         EX    R1,CLC1&X           COMPARE USER PREFIX TO ZTEMPF
         BE    MDDD&X              ZTEMPF IS A REAL NAME
         TRT   ZUSER,SPFTRT        FIND END OF USER ID
         BNZ   MBBB&X
         LA    R1,ZUSER+8
MBBB&X   EQU   *
         LA    R15,ZUSER           START OF USER-ID
         SR    R1,R15              LENGTH OF USER PREFIX
         SH    R1,=H'1'            DECR FOR EX
LPA&X    EQU   *
         LA    R14,1(R14)          BUMP
         EX    R1,CLC2&X           FIND USER-ID IMBEDDED IN ZTEMPF
         BE    MCCC&X              FOUND IT
         B     LPA&X
MCCC&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(45),BLANKS  CLEAR
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(18),0(R14)   MOVE USER-ID + NEXT QUALIFIER
         LA    R14,SPFDYNAM         START OF NEW DSN
         LA    R14,2(R14,R1)        BUMP PAST ID AND DOT
         MVC   0(7,R14),=C'SPFTEMP'   ADD THIS QUALIFIER
         TRT   SPFDYNAM(45),SPFTRT  FIND END OF DSN
         MVC   0(5,R1),=C'.CNTL'   ADD ANOTHER QUALIFIER
         B     MEEE&X
CLC1&X   CLC   0(0,R14),ZPREFIX    COMPARE
CLC2&X   CLC   0(0,R14),ZUSER      COMPARE
MVC1&X   MVC   SPFDYNAM(0),0(R14)  MOVE
MDDD&X   EQU   *
         MVC   SPFDYNAM(44),ZTEMPF
MEEE&X   EQU   *
.AAA     ANOP
         MVI   &ODS,C' '          CLEAR THE
&LA      SETC  'L''&ODS-1'
         MVC   &ODS+1(&LA),&ODS TARGET FIELD
         MVC   &ODS,&INDS         MOVE DSN TO TARGET
         XC    SPFTRT,SPFTRT      CLEAR TRT TABLE
         MVI   SPFTRT+C'.',X'FF'  DOT
         MVI   SPFTRT+C' ',X'FF'  BLANK
         LA    R15,&ODS
LPR&X    EQU   *
&LA      SETC  'L''&ODS'
         TRT   0(&LA,R15),SPFTRT FIND A DOT OR BLANK
         CLI   0(R1),C' '         WAS IT A BLANK ?
         BE    MFFF&X
         LR    R14,R1             DOT
         LA    R15,1(R1)
         B     LPR&X              KEEP GOING
MFFF&X   EQU   *
         LA    R14,1(R14)         BUMP PAST DOT
         AIF   ('&QUAL'(1,1) EQ '''').BBB
         MVC   0(8,R14),=8C' '    CLEAR
&LA      SETC  'L''&QUAL'
         MVC   0(&LA,R14),&QUAL MOVE QUALIFIER
         AGO   .DONE
.BBB     ANOP
&LIT     SETC  '&QUAL'(2,K'&QUAL-2)
         MVC   0(8,R14),=CL8'&LIT'  MOVE LAST QUALIFIER
.DONE    ANOP
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)

.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*

.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL

SPFVCOPY.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFVCOPY &FLD,&MODE=MOVE,&DC=YES
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO INVOKES THE SPF VCOPY SERVICE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         LCLA  &X,&B,&N,&LL
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&N       SETA  N'&FLD
         LA    R1,LEN&X
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
&B       SETA  2
.AAA     ANOP
         MVC   0(4,R1),=A(&FLD(&B))
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).BBB
         LA    R1,4(R1)
&B       SETA  &B+2
         AGO   .AAA
.BBB     ANOP
         CALL  ISPLINK,(VCOPY,FLD&X,LEN&X,&FLD(1),&MODE),VL
         B     MAAA&X
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
&B       SETA  1
         AIF   (&N GT 2).CCC
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(1)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(1))'
         AGO   .FFF
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
.CCC     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(&B)'
.DDD     ANOP
&B       SETA  &B+2
         AIF   (&B EQ &N-1).EEE
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B)'
         AGO   .DDD
.EEE     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B))'
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.FFF     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DC' EQ 'NO').HHH
&B       SETA  1
.GGG     ANOP
&FLD(&B) DC    CL&FLD(&B+1)' '
         AIF   (&B EQ &N-1).HHH
&B       SETA  &B+2
         AGO   .GGG
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.HHH     ANOP
&B       SETA  2
LEN&X    DS    0F
.III     ANOP
         DC    A(&FLD(&B))
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).DONE
&B       SETA  &B+2
         AGO   .III
.DONE    ANOP
MAAA&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*
.*       FREEWARE: THIS MACRO IS DISTRIBUTED ON AN AS-IS BASIS
.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
.*                 THE NATIONAL SYSTEMS PROGRAMMERS ASSOCIATION (NASPA)
.*                 P.O. BOX 21525
.*                 GREENFIELD, WI 53221
.*
.*
.*       MACRO WRITTEN BY:
.*
.*                 PRODUCTIVITY SYSTEMS, INC.
.*                 MILWAUKEE, WI
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

.*    DOCUMENTATION STANDARDS, BUT HAS NOT BEEN PROGRAM TESTED IN ANY
.*    FORMAL FASHION BY NASPA. THE USER IS EXPECTED TO MAKE THE FINAL
.*    EVALUATION OF THE USE OF THIS MACRO IN THEIR ENVIRONMENT.
.*

SPFVDEF.text:
MACRO
&NAME    SPFVDEF &LEN,&FLD,&TYPE=CHAR,&DC=YES
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
.*       THIS MACRO INVOKES THE SPF VDEFINE SERVICE.
.*
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------
&NAME    DS    0H
         GBLC  &VDEF1
         LCLA  &X,&B,&N,&LL
         LCLC  &DCTYPE,&PAD                 @MK
&X       SETA  &SYSNDX
&PAD     SETC  ' '                          @MK
&DCTYPE  SETC  'C'                          @MK
         AIF   ('&VDEF1' EQ 'NO').AAA
&VDEF1   SETC  'NO'
         CNOP  0,4
         B     *+8
ISPLEN   DC    A(0)       LENGTH FIELD
.AAA     ANOP
         AIF   ('&TYPE' NE 'FIXED').NOTFIX   @MK
&PAD     SETC  '0'                           @MK
&DCTYPE  SETC  'F'                           @MK
.NOTFIX  ANOP                                @MK
&N       SETA  N'&FLD
         MVC   ISPLEN,=A(&LEN)
         CALL  ISPLINK,(VDEFINE,FLD&X,&FLD(1),&TYPE,ISPLEN),VL
         B     MAAA&X
&B       SETA  1
         AIF   (&N GT 1).BBB
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(1)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(1))'
         AGO   .EEE
.*--------------------------------------------------------------------
.BBB     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+2
FLD&X    DC    CL&LL'(&FLD(&B)'
.CCC     ANOP
&B       SETA  &B+1
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).DDD
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B)'
         AGO   .CCC
.DDD     ANOP
&LL      SETA  K'&FLD(&B)+1
         DC    CL&LL'&FLD(&B))'
*-------------------------------------------------------------------
.EEE     ANOP
         AIF   ('&DC' EQ 'NO').DONE
&B       SETA  1
.FFF     ANOP
&FLD(&B) DC    &DCTYPE.L&LEN'&PAD'                  @MK
         AIF   (&B EQ &N).DONE
&B       SETA  &B+1
         AGO   .FFF
.DONE    ANOP
MAAA&X   DS    0H
.*---------------------------------------------------------------------

.*                 WITHOUT WARRANTY, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, BY:
.*
